name: Genius: Painting A Portrait Of The Lost Generation
detailed_description: The cast explains how it feels to be a part of this project, and the process of getting into character. We'll also examine the great writers and true historic figures portrayed in the film, whose passion for the written word defined an era.
about_the_game: The cast explains how it feels to be a part of this project, and the process of getting into character. We'll also examine the great writers and true historic figures portrayed in the film, whose passion for the written word defined an era.
